definition: to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: It's not working. We need an army of climate outlaws.
sentences.chinese: 它不掂，我们需要一队军队的气候亡命之徒。

sentences.english: Desperado, Why don, t you come to your senses?
sentences.chinese: 亡命之徒，为什么你还没清醒？

sentences.english: Desperado, oh, you ain't getting no youger.
sentences.chinese: 亡命之徒，哦，你已经年华老去。

sentences.english: Desperado, oh, you aint gettin no younger.
sentences.chinese: 亡命之徒，哦，你已不再年轻。

sentences.english: Desperado, why don't you come to your senses?
sentences.chinese: 亡命之徒，为什么你还不清醒？

sentences.english: Desperado, oh, you ain't gettin no younger.
sentences.chinese: 亡命之徒，噢，你已不再年轻。

sentences.english: Desperado, why dont you come to your senses?
sentences.chinese: 亡命之徒，为何不步向你的感觉？

sentences.english: Desperado, oh, you ain't getting no younger.
sentences.chinese: 亡命之徒，哦，你已经年华老去。

sentences.english: Desperado, oh, you ain't gettin' no younger.
sentences.chinese: 亡命之徒，噢，你早已不再年轻。

definition: to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
to break into a house for robbery (idiom)
to kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
lit. to kill people like scything flax (idiom)/fig. to kill people like flies
to flee/to go into exile (from prison)
(of a villain) to do the dirty on another villain
